Let<S>5015</S> not<S>3361</S> your<S>5216</S> heart<S>2588</S> be troubled<S>5015</S>: ye believe<S>4100</S> in<S>1519</S> God<S>2316</S>, believe<S>4100</S> also<S>2532</S> in<S>1519</S> me<S>1691</S>.
In<S>1722</S> my<S>3450</S> Father's<S>3962</S> house<S>3614</S> are<S>1526</S> many<S>4183</S> mansions<S>3438</S>: if it were not<S>1490</S> so, I would have told<S>302</S> <S>2036</S> you<S>5213</S>. I go<S>4198</S> to prepare<S>2090</S> a place<S>5117</S> for you<S>5213</S>.
And<S>2532</S> if<S>1437</S> I go<S>4198</S> and<S>2532</S> prepare<S>2090</S> a place<S>5117</S> for you<S>5213</S>, I will come<S>2064</S> again<S>3825</S>, and<S>2532</S> receive<S>3880</S> you<S>5209</S> unto<S>4314</S> myself<S>1683</S>; that<S>2443</S> where<S>3699</S> I<S>1473</S> am<S>1510</S>, there ye<S>5210</S> may be<S>5600</S> also<S>2532</S>.
And<S>2532</S> whither<S>3699</S> I<S>1473</S> go<S>5217</S> ye know<S>1492</S>, and<S>2532</S> the way<S>3598</S> ye know<S>1492</S>.
Thomas<S>2381</S> saith<S>3004</S> unto him<S>846</S>, Lord<S>2962</S>, we know<S>1492</S> not<S>3756</S> whither<S>4226</S> thou goest<S>5217</S>; and<S>2532</S> how<S>4459</S> can we<S>1410</S> know<S>1492</S> the way<S>3598</S>?
Jesus<S>2424</S> saith<S>3004</S> unto him<S>846</S>, I<S>1473</S> am<S>1510</S> the way<S>3598</S>,<S>2532</S> the truth<S>225</S>, and<S>2532</S> the life<S>2222</S>: no man<S>3762</S> cometh<S>2064</S> unto<S>4314</S> the Father<S>3962</S>, but<S>1508</S> by<S>1223</S> me<S>1700</S>.
If<S>1487</S> ye had known<S>1097</S> me<S>3165</S>,<S>302</S> ye should have known<S>1097</S> my<S>3450</S> Father<S>3962</S> also<S>2532</S>: and<S>2532</S> from<S>575</S> henceforth<S>737</S> ye know<S>1097</S> him<S>846</S>, and<S>2532</S> have seen<S>3708</S> him<S>846</S>.
Philip<S>5376</S> saith<S>3004</S> unto him<S>846</S>, Lord<S>2962</S>, shew<S>1166</S> us<S>2254</S> the Father<S>3962</S>, and<S>2532</S> it sufficeth<S>714</S> us<S>2254</S>.
Jesus<S>2424</S> saith<S>3004</S> unto him<S>846</S>, Have I been<S>1510</S> so long<S>5118</S> time<S>5550</S> with<S>3326</S> you<S>5216</S>, and yet<S>2532</S> hast thou<S>1097</S> not<S>3756</S> known<S>1097</S> me<S>3165</S>, Philip<S>5376</S>? he that hath seen<S>3708</S> me<S>1691</S> hath seen<S>3708</S> the Father<S>3962</S>; and<S>2532</S> how<S>4459</S> sayest<S>3004</S> thou<S>4771</S> then, Shew<S>1166</S> us<S>2254</S> the Father<S>3962</S>?
Believest thou<S>4100</S> not<S>3756</S> that<S>3754</S> I<S>1473</S> am<S>2076</S> in<S>1722</S> the Father<S>3962</S>, and<S>2532</S> the Father<S>3962</S> in<S>1722</S> me<S>1698</S>? the words<S>4487</S> that<S>3739</S> I<S>1473</S> speak<S>2980</S> unto you<S>5213</S> I speak<S>2980</S> not<S>3756</S> of<S>575</S> myself<S>1683</S>: but<S>1161</S> the Father<S>3962</S> that dwelleth<S>3306</S> in<S>1722</S> me<S>1698</S>, he<S>846</S> doeth<S>4160</S> the works<S>2041</S>.
Believe<S>4100</S> me<S>3427</S> that<S>3754</S> I<S>1473</S> am in<S>1722</S> the Father<S>3962</S>, and<S>2532</S> the Father<S>3962</S> in<S>1722</S> me<S>1698</S>: or else<S>1490</S> believe<S>4100</S> me<S>3427</S> for<S>1223</S> the very<S>846</S> works'<S>2041</S> sake<S>846</S>.
Verily<S>281</S>, verily<S>281</S>, I say<S>3004</S> unto you<S>5213</S>, He that believeth<S>4100</S> on<S>1519</S> me<S>1691</S>, the works<S>2041</S> that<S>3739</S> I<S>1473</S> do<S>4160</S> shall he do<S>4160</S> also<S>2548</S>; and<S>2532</S> greater works than<S>3187</S> these<S>5130</S> shall he do<S>4160</S>; because<S>3754</S> I<S>1473</S> go<S>4198</S> unto<S>4314</S> my<S>3450</S> Father<S>3962</S>.
And<S>3739</S> <S>2532</S> whatsoever<S>3748</S> <S>302</S> ye shall ask<S>154</S> in<S>1722</S> my<S>3450</S> name<S>3686</S>, that<S>5124</S> will I do<S>4160</S>, that<S>2443</S> the Father<S>3962</S> may be glorified<S>1392</S> in<S>1722</S> the Son<S>5207</S>.
If<S>1437</S> ye shall ask<S>154</S> any thing<S>5100</S> in<S>1722</S> my<S>3450</S> name<S>3686</S>, I<S>1473</S> will do<S>4160</S> it.
If<S>1437</S> ye love<S>25</S> me<S>3165</S>, keep<S>5083</S> my<S>1699</S> commandments<S>1785</S>.
And<S>2532</S> I<S>1473</S> will pray<S>2065</S> the Father<S>3962</S>, and<S>2532</S> he shall give<S>1325</S> you<S>5213</S> another<S>243</S> Comforter<S>3875</S>, that<S>2443</S> he may abide<S>3306</S> with<S>3326</S> you<S>5216</S> for<S>1519</S> ever<S>165</S>;
 Even the Spirit<S>4151</S> of truth<S>225</S>; whom<S>3739</S> the world<S>2889</S> cannot<S>3756</S> <S>1410</S> receive<S>2983</S>, because<S>3754</S> it seeth<S>2334</S> him<S>846</S> not<S>3756</S>, neither<S>3761</S> knoweth<S>1097</S> him<S>846</S>: but<S>1161</S> ye<S>5210</S> know<S>1097</S> him<S>846</S>; for<S>3754</S> he dwelleth<S>3306</S> with<S>3844</S> you<S>5213</S>, and<S>2532</S> shall be<S>2071</S> in<S>1722</S> you<S>5213</S>.
I will<S>863</S> not<S>3756</S> leave<S>863</S> you<S>5209</S> comfortless<S>3737</S>: I will come<S>2064</S> to<S>4314</S> you<S>5209</S>. <sup>comfortless: or, orphans</sup>
Yet<S>2089</S> a little while<S>3397</S>, and<S>2532</S> the world<S>2889</S> seeth<S>2334</S> me<S>3165</S> no more<S>3765</S>; but<S>1161</S> ye<S>5210</S> see<S>2334</S> me<S>3165</S>: because<S>3754</S> I<S>1473</S> live<S>2198</S>, ye<S>5210</S> shall live<S>2198</S> also<S>2532</S>.
At<S>1722</S> that<S>1565</S> day<S>2250</S> ye<S>5210</S> shall know<S>1097</S> that<S>3754</S> I<S>1473</S> am in<S>1722</S> my<S>3450</S> Father<S>3962</S>, and<S>2532</S> ye<S>5210</S> in<S>1722</S> me<S>1698</S>, and I<S>2504</S> in<S>1722</S> you<S>5213</S>.
He that hath<S>2192</S> my<S>3450</S> commandments<S>1785</S>, and<S>2532</S> keepeth<S>5083</S> them<S>846</S>, he<S>1565</S> it is<S>2076</S> that loveth<S>25</S> me<S>3165</S>: and<S>1161</S> he that loveth<S>25</S> me<S>3165</S> shall be loved<S>25</S> of<S>5259</S> my<S>3450</S> Father<S>3962</S>, and<S>2532</S> I<S>1473</S> will love<S>25</S> him<S>846</S>, and<S>2532</S> will manifest<S>1718</S> myself<S>1683</S> to him<S>846</S>.
Judas<S>2455</S> saith<S>3004</S> unto him<S>846</S>, not<S>3756</S> Iscariot<S>2469</S>, Lord<S>2962</S>, how<S>5101</S> is it<S>1096</S> that<S>3754</S> thou wilt<S>3195</S> manifest<S>1718</S> thyself<S>4572</S> unto us<S>2254</S>, and<S>2532</S> not<S>3780</S> unto the world<S>2889</S>?
Jesus<S>2424</S> answered<S>611</S> and<S>2532</S> said<S>2036</S> unto him<S>846</S>, If<S>1437</S> a man<S>5100</S> love<S>25</S> me<S>3165</S>, he will keep<S>5083</S> my<S>3450</S> words<S>3056</S>: and<S>2532</S> my<S>3450</S> Father<S>3962</S> will love<S>25</S> him<S>846</S>, and<S>2532</S> we will come<S>2064</S> unto<S>4314</S> him<S>846</S>, and<S>2532</S> make<S>4160</S> our abode<S>3438</S> with<S>3844</S> him<S>846</S>.
He that loveth<S>25</S> me<S>3165</S> not<S>3361</S> keepeth<S>5083</S> not<S>3756</S> my<S>3450</S> sayings<S>3056</S>: and<S>2532</S> the word<S>3056</S> which<S>3739</S> ye hear<S>191</S> is<S>2076</S> not<S>3756</S> mine<S>1699</S>, but<S>235</S> the Father's<S>3962</S> which<S>3588</S> sent<S>3992</S> me<S>3165</S>.
These things<S>5023</S> have I spoken<S>2980</S> unto you<S>5213</S>, being yet present<S>3306</S> with<S>3844</S> you<S>5213</S>.
But<S>1161</S> the Comforter<S>3875</S>, which is the Holy<S>40</S> Ghost<S>4151</S>, whom<S>3739</S> the Father<S>3962</S> will send<S>3992</S> in<S>1722</S> my<S>3450</S> name<S>3686</S>, he<S>1565</S> shall teach<S>1321</S> you<S>5209</S> all things<S>3956</S>, and<S>2532</S> bring<S>5279</S> all things<S>3956</S> to<S>5279</S> your<S>5209</S> remembrance<S>5279</S>, whatsoever<S>3739</S> I have said<S>2036</S> unto you<S>5213</S>.
Peace<S>1515</S> I leave<S>863</S> with you<S>5213</S>, my<S>1699</S> peace<S>1515</S> I give<S>1325</S> unto you<S>5213</S>: not<S>3756</S> as<S>2531</S> the world<S>2889</S> giveth<S>1325</S>, give<S>1325</S> I<S>1473</S> unto you<S>5213</S>. Let<S>5015</S> not<S>3361</S> your<S>5216</S> heart<S>2588</S> be troubled<S>5015</S>, neither<S>3366</S> let it be afraid<S>1168</S>.
Ye have heard<S>191</S> how<S>3754</S> I<S>1473</S> said<S>2036</S> unto you<S>5213</S>, I go away<S>5217</S>, and<S>2532</S> come<S>2064</S> again unto<S>4314</S> you<S>5209</S>. If<S>1487</S> ye loved<S>25</S> me<S>3165</S>,<S>302</S> ye would rejoice<S>5463</S>, because<S>3754</S> I said<S>2036</S>, I go<S>4198</S> unto<S>4314</S> the Father<S>3962</S>: for<S>3754</S> my<S>3450</S> Father<S>3962</S> is<S>2076</S> greater than<S>3187</S> I<S>3450</S>.
And<S>2532</S> now<S>3568</S> I have told<S>2046</S> you<S>5213</S> before<S>4250</S> it come to pass<S>1096</S>, that<S>2443</S>, when<S>3752</S> it is come to pass<S>1096</S>, ye might believe<S>4100</S>.
Hereafter<S>3765</S> I will<S>2980</S> not<S>3765</S> talk<S>2980</S> much<S>4183</S> with<S>3326</S> you<S>5216</S>: for<S>1063</S> the prince<S>758</S> of this<S>5127</S> world<S>2889</S> cometh<S>2064</S>, and<S>2532</S> hath<S>2192</S> <S>3756</S> nothing<S>3762</S> in<S>1722</S> me<S>1698</S>.
But<S>235</S> that<S>2443</S> the world<S>2889</S> may know<S>1097</S> that<S>3754</S> I love<S>25</S> the Father<S>3962</S>; and<S>2532</S> as<S>2531</S> the Father<S>3962</S> gave<S>1781</S> me<S>3427</S> commandment<S>1781</S>, even so<S>3779</S> I do<S>4160</S>. Arise<S>1453</S>, let us go<S>71</S> hence<S>1782</S>.
